name: Aquarium Idle
description:
Aquarium Idle Game is the most fun and addictive of all idle games! Get ready to earn money from your own aquarium.

- Unlock new floors with different fishes
- Earn money your visitors
- Collect your offline bonus when you come back!
- Come back daily and claim bonus
- Tap top screen to call more visitors to the entrance
- Tap the floors to call them from the entrance to your floors
